column4: I really screwed up my ubuntu system by accidentally using a debian repo.  It looks like python-minimal and/or python are screwed up.  It was recommended that I download those packages from http://packages.ubuntu.com/hardy/python2.5-minimal, but I cannot find a download link.  Does anyone have a suggestion, even for a different direction?
if you've mixed repos, I'd suggest a clean install to get back to a sane state
This is a networked server, not sure if that is easy for me to do.  Slicehost.
contact slicehost for remote hands, or plan a trip to the DC
